name: Mesquite Smoked Jerky
author: KAPRER
summary: This jerky tastes just like the store bought kind. If you like those kinds, you'll enjoy this very much. Use Hickory smoked flavoring instead, if you'd like.
ingredients: 1 pound beef eye of round sliced into 1/4 inch strips
2 tablespoons mesquite flavored liquid smoke concentrate
directions: In a shallow glass baking dish,  stir together the soy sauce, brown sugar, liquid smoke, paprika, garlic, and salt
Lay the meat strips in the liquid in a single layer
Cover the dish, and refrigerate for at least 6 hours
Arrange strips of beef in a dehydrator, and let dry for 6 hours, or to desired dryness
